attributes.additional_details: In  the last 3 months alone there has been 3 fatalities on this stretch of the road. Yesterday 13/08/2012 three cars collided and a 15 year old girl died and several others were injured. MAKE THIS STOP WITH TRAFFIC CALMING MEASURES!  People do not judge the A19 properly and go at speed which causes accidents. Would measures to stop people speeding or drinking stop people getting killed or severely injured. Why do the councils or government do nothing about this why does it have to come to this for them to sit up and listen.....

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
